Dear PlanetSpark Team,

I am writing to inform you of ongoing issues we have been experiencing with your system, specifically regarding the video upload functionality in the performance classes. Over the past several weeks, we have consistently faced difficulties uploading videos. Despite multiple attempts, each video, all under one minute in length, fails to upload, even though your system ostensibly supports videos up to three minutes.

This issue is critical as the ability to upload and review performance videos is a primary feature we rely on. It is causing significant disruption to our educational activities. Additionally, if the platform is intended to restrict videos to one minute, I suggest modifying the system to stop recording at the one-minute mark. This would prevent any confusion and ensure that children do not record beyond the supported duration.

We request your immediate attention to this matter. Please address this issue as soon as possible to avoid further inconvenience.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this urgent issue.

Best regards,

Nirmalee

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring to your attention a concerning matter regarding my recent interaction with your center.
On 14th March I received communication from Ankit at your PLANT SPARK sturdy centre, who requested an upfront payment of 7000 INR assuring me that my EMIs would commence after a two-month grace period following my confirmation. I complied with the request and initiated a bank ECS as instructed.
To my dismay, the amount has already begun deductions from my account, despite the promised grace period. This situation raises serious concerns about the integrity of the communication and the legitimacy of the transaction.
Upon reflection and subsequent investigation, it has become apparent that I have been misled and subjected to fraudulent practices. I deeply regret any misunderstanding that may have occurred, but I am left with no choice but to bring this matter to your attention.
I urge you to investigate this incident promptly and take the necessary actions to rectify the situation. Furthermore, I request a full refund of the amount deducted from my account and the cessation of any further deductions also stops my ECS.

I trust that you will treat this matter with the urgency and seriousness it deserves. Please feel free to contact me at 9013840603 to discuss this matter further and provide any additional information you may require.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Ashish
